subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput king is known for his contribution to the formation of the Mewar Kingdom?
question_hi: मेवार क्षेत्र को कौन से राज्यविद ब्राह्मण के सहायता से बनाई गई थी?
explanation_en: King Rao Jodha is known for his contribution in the formation of Mewar Kingdom. He played a crucial role in the battle of Haldighati against Mughal Emperor Akbar.
